blocks.name: pwssplit4
blocks.content: Splitting for structure powers 4: maps isomorphically onto the other half. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: pwslnm
blocks.content: Finite powers of Noetherian modules are Noetherian. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Jan-2015.)

thm pwslnm(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  findcard2s(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, c1), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs0)), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, emptycls), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm)), wi(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), clnm)))

  syl(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, emptycls), clnm), wcel(c0, clmod))
  pwslnmlem0(c0, co(c0, cpws, emptycls))
  eqid(co(c0, cpws, emptycls))
  a2d(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), clnm))

  pwslnmlem2(co(c0, cpws, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)), co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), c0, co(c0, cpws, csn(cv(hs2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1)))), wa(wcel(c0, clnm), wcel(co(c0, cpws, cv(hs1)), clnm))))
